name: Raul A. PEREZ, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of July 2016, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

141 A.3d 1274
Raul A. PEREZ, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
